metadata.title: CVE-2022-45343 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC v2.1-DEV-rev478-g696e6f868-master was discovered to contain a heapuse-after-free via the Q_IsTypeOn function at /gpac/src/bifs/unquantize.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
